issue.title: UDP Ports leak on calling close on ApnsClient - 0.13.5

repository.name: pushy
repository.description: A Java library for sending APNs (iOS/macOS/Safari) push notifications

issue.title: Close delegate resolver from RoundRobinInetAddressResolver

repository.name: netty
repository.description: Netty project - an event-driven asynchronous network application framework

issue.body:
Motivation:

`RoundRobinDnsAddressResolverGroup` ultimately opens UDP ports for DNS resolution. Callers likely expect that [`RoundRobinDnsAddressResolverGroup#close()`](https://netty.io/4.1/api/io/netty/resolver/AddressResolverGroup.html#close--) will close those ports, but that is not currently true (see #9212).

Modifications:

Overrode `RoundRobinInetAddressResolver#close()` to close the delegate name resolver, which in turn closes any UDP ports used for name resolution.

Result:

`RoundRobinDnsAddressResolverGroup#close()` closes UDP ports as expected. This fixes #9212.

body: I've opened #9214 as a potential fix for this issue.

issue.title: Update to Netty 4.1.37

repository.name: pushy
repository.description: A Java library for sending APNs (iOS/macOS/Safari) push notifications

issue.body: As advertised, this updates to the latest version of Netty. Importantly, this contains a fix for https://github.com/netty/netty/issues/9212, which in turn fixes #675. ~The update to netty-tcnative also closes #699~ (EDIT: I merged that fix separately).

issue.title: UDP tests fail with Netty >= 4.1.37

labels.name: for/netty
labels.description: This belongs to the Netty project

repository.name: reactor-netty
repository.description: TCP/HTTP/UDP/QUIC client/server with Reactor over Netty

issue.body:
https://travis-ci.org/reactor/reactor-netty/builds/551743903

```
reactor.netty.udp.UdpClientTest > smokeTest FAILED
    java.lang.AssertionError
        at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:86)
        at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:41)
        at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:52)
        at reactor.netty.udp.UdpClientTest.smokeTest(UdpClientTest.java:104)
reactor.netty.udp.UdpServerTests > portBindingException FAILED
    java.lang.AssertionError: illegal-success
        at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:88)
        at reactor.netty.udp.UdpServerTests.portBindingException(UdpServerTests.java:267)
```
